page.title: 05My Home in Frogmore.
page.content: My house has got six rooms. We have got two bedrooms, one bathroom, one kitchen and one lounge. We have got two rooms upstairs and four rooms downstairs. Mummy and daddy have one bedroom and my sister and brother and I share the other. When I look out of the window I see lots of fields. My garden has got apple trees, plum trees and damson trees. We have also got a blackberry bush. We grow lots of plants in our garden. We have five sheds. One of our sheds we use for our bikes and another as a play shed - once we kept two goats in it and they ate the door off. My dad uses a shed to put his van in, the other two are used for wood for the fire.
